name: The Doorbreaker
description: The Doorbreaker is a story about one very patient person who has a long way to go in the obscurity. The game includes more than 26 different levels where you have to break doors with a random chance. This game requires you to be patient and tough, I warn you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
